feed.title: MSFS Blog
feed.subtitle: Development updates of Microsoft Flight Simulator.

entry.title: Freedom Fox from Parallel 42 Available Today in the Marketplace
entry.summary: ﻿In full collaboration with Trent Palmer, experience Freedom Fox, and a customized variant named “Fox2” with a beautiful selection of liveries. The only Kitfox you’ll ever need, now available in the Marketplace on Xbox & PC.Learn more about Freedom Fox here.

entry.title: April 21st, 2022 Development Update
entry.summary: Thank you to everyone who submitted or upvoted a question in the forums for our upcoming Dev Q&A! We are taking a look now and are looking forward to chatting with you next week, April 27th at 10:30am PT (1730Z) on Twitch.

entry.title: Release Notes (1.25.7.0) Sim Update IX Now Available!
entry.summary: Release Notes for Version 1.25.7.0 (Sim Update 9) are now available. Please launch the Xbox App or Steam to download the latest update.

entry.title: April 28th, 2022 Development Update
entry.summary: Sim Update IX is out now! Click here to see release notes. If you’d like to provide your overall impressions of the update, don’t forget to vote in our forum polls here and leave us a comment.

entry.title: May 5th, 2022 Development Update
entry.summary: Thank you for providing feedback since the release of Sim Update 9! At this time, we are hard at work on a patch that will fix some of the emerging issues we have seen this past week. We are excited to share more details and patch notes soon.

entry.title: Community Spotlight: Gregory Davis
entry.summary: In 2021, Gregory embarked on a new career challenge when he accepted the role of President of Eviation, an electric aircraft company based out of Arlington Municipal Airport (ICAO: KAWO) in the greater Seattle area. Learn more about Greg and his history playing Microsoft Flight Simulator!

entry.title: Famous Flyer II: Gee Bee Model Z Super Sportster and Model R-2 Super Sportster
entry.summary: ﻿Microsoft Flight Simulator’s latest Famous Flyer offerings take you into the cockpits of the most legendary speed kings of the Golden Age of Flight: The Gee Bee Model Z and the Gee Bee Model R-2. These Super Sportsters dominated air racing at the sport’s peak in the early 1930s, and they continue to captivate imaginations … Continued

entry.title: Community Spotlight: Deekay
entry.summary: We are pleased to shine the spotlight on a member of the Microsoft Flight Simulator player community from South Korea: David Kang, who goes by Deekay online. In addition to being an Orbx partner, he is also a leader of Fly Together Korea, a community of nearly 4,500 Korean flight sim enthusiasts. When not flying … Continued
